selected_quotes: The Rise of Behavioral Economics: Thaler's Misbehaving
On Thaler's Misbehaving, with notes on the future of behavioral economics (and on the best graduation advice ever).
The rise of behavioral economics, and its future, with reference to Thaler's terrific Misbehaving.
In honor of the coming paperback of Thaler's truly great Misbehaving: my (not unbiased) review. @R_Thaler
Beware the Behavioral Sciences Team Heuristic, says
